Author: theyoungceo
Content: Banks say they won't loan more than 15-20% of revenue. SBA will guarantee and might be able to get loans up to $250K, but that requires a personal guarantee -- if for some reason something goes wrong, I don't want to be personally bankrupt.

Author: gibsonf1
Content: "Our study confirms many changes seen in upper Arctic Ocean circulation in the 1990s were mostly decadal in nature, rather than trends caused by global warming," said Morison.
